visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a gauge chart with dual axes. The chart should have a title 'Speedometer with dual axes'. The first axis should range from 0 to 200 with a blue color scheme, and the second axis should range from 0 to 124 with a red color scheme. The data series should display a single value of 80 with custom data labels showing both km/h and mph values. The chart should also include a dynamic update feature where the value changes every 3 seconds.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a gauge chart with dual axes to display a speedometer. The chart type is set to 'gauge', and it includes a title 'Speedometer with dual axes'. The first yAxis ranges from 0 to 200 with a blue color scheme, while the second yAxis ranges from 0 to 124 with a red color scheme. The data series includes a single value of 80, with custom data labels that display both km/h and mph values. The chart also features a dynamic update mechanism where the value changes every 3 seconds, ensuring the chart remains interactive and engaging. The visualization is designed to be clear and informative, with distinct color schemes for each axis to enhance readability.
